channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1003051|2024-08-05T03:07:17.934Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20irc%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins IRC Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16543|2024-08-05T01:17:40.220Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20spira%20importer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Spira Importer Plugin 3.2.2 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-08-05T20:11:12.392Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003020|2024-08-05T03:00:19.309Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kanboard%20plugin
item.description: A server-side request forgery vulnerability exists in Jenkins Kanboard Plugin 1.5.10 and earlier in KanboardGlobalConfiguration.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to submit a GET request to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2019-16546|2024-08-05T01:17:40.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.1.1 and earlier does not verify SSH host keys when connecting agents created by the plugin, enabling man-in-the-middle attacks.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003057|2024-08-05T03:07:17.893Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20approve%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Approve Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003004|2024-08-05T03:00:19.430Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: An improper authorization vulnerability exists in Jenkins 2.158 and earlier, LTS 2.150.1 and earlier in core/src/main/java/hudson/security/AuthenticationProcessingFilter2.java that allows attackers to extend the duration of active HTTP sessions indefinitely even though the user account may have been deleted in the mean time.

item.title: CVE-2019-16550|2024-08-05T01:17:40.818Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in a connection test form method in Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.16.1 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins connect to an attacker specified web server and parse XML documents.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003094|2024-08-05T03:07:18.257Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20open%20stf%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Open STF Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16575|2024-08-05T01:17:40.906Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20kubernetes%20suport%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Alauda Kubernetes Suport Plugin 2.3.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing the Kubernetes service account token or credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003015|2024-08-05T03:00:19.428Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20import%20plugin
item.description: An XML external entity processing vulnerability exists in Jenkins Job Import Plugin 2.1 and earlier in src/main/java/org/jenkins/ci/plugins/jobimport/client/RestApiClient.java that allows attackers with the ability to control the HTTP server (Jenkins) queried in preparation of job import to read arbitrary files, perform a denial of service attack, etc.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003034|2024-08-05T03:07:16.812Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20dsl%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Job DSL Plugin 1.71 and earlier in job-dsl-core/src/main/groovy/javaposse/jobdsl/dsl/AbstractDslScriptLoader.groovy, job-dsl-plugin/build.gradle, job-dsl-plugin/src/main/groovy/javaposse/jobdsl/plugin/JobDslWhitelist.groovy, job-dsl-plugin/src/main/groovy/javaposse/jobdsl/plugin/SandboxDslScriptLoader.groovy that allows attackers with control over Job DSL definitions to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003033|2024-08-05T03:07:16.685Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Groovy Plugin 2.1 and earlier in pom.xml, src/main/java/hudson/plugins/groovy/StringScriptSource.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003068|2024-08-05T03:07:17.852Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vmware%20vrealize%20automation%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins VMware vRealize Automation Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003040|2024-08-05T03:07:16.744Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.55 and earlier allows attackers to invoke arbitrary constructors in sandboxed scripts.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003049|2024-08-05T03:07:18.205Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Users who cached their CLI authentication before Jenkins was updated to 2.150.2 and newer, or 2.160 and newer, would remain authenticated in Jenkins 2.171 and earlier and Jenkins LTS 2.164.1 and earlier, because the fix for CVE-2019-1003004 in these releases did not reject existing remoting-based CLI authentication caches.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003021|2024-08-05T03:00:19.431Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openid%20connect%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: An exposure of sensitive information vulnerability exists in Jenkins OpenId Connect Authentication Plugin 1.4 and earlier in OicSecurityRealm/config.jelly that allows attackers able to view a Jenkins administrator's web browser output, or control the browser (e.g. malicious extension) to retrieve the configured client secret.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003066|2024-08-05T03:07:16.826Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bugzilla%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bugzilla Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16538|2024-08-05T01:17:40.259Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.67 and earlier related to the handling of default parameter expressions in closures allowed attackers to execute arbitrary code in sandboxed scripts.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003079|2024-08-05T03:07:18.248Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vmware%20lab%20manager%20slaves%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins VMware Lab Manager Slaves Plugin in the LabManager.DescriptorImpl#doTestConnection form validation method allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003027|2024-08-05T03:00:19.287Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20octopusdeploy%20plugin
item.description: A server-side request forgery vulnerability exists in Jenkins OctopusDeploy Plugin 1.8.1 and earlier in OctopusDeployPlugin.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to have Jenkins connect to an attacker-specified URL and obtain the HTTP response code if successful, and exception error message otherwise.

item.title: CVE-2019-16561|2024-08-05T01:17:41.047Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20websphere%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins WebSphere Deployer Plugin 1.6.1 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read access to disable SSL/TLS certificate and hostname validation for the entire Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003095|2024-08-05T03:07:17.933Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20perfecto%20mobile%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Perfecto Mobile Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16552|2024-08-05T01:17:40.885Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gerrit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Gerrit Trigger Plugin 2.30.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL or SSH server using attacker-specified credentials, or determine the existence of a file with a given path on the Jenkins master.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003097|2024-08-05T03:07:18.347Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20crowd%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Crowd Integration Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in the global config.xml configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003047|2024-08-05T03:07:17.963Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20on%20demand%20uploader%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Fortify on Demand Uploader Plugin 3.0.10 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003043|2024-08-05T03:07:18.034Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20slack%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Slack Notification Plugin 2.19 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16574|2024-08-05T01:17:40.996Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20devops%20pipeline%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Alauda DevOps Pipeline Plugin 2.3.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16553|2024-08-05T01:17:40.794Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 1.24.1 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins evaluate a computationally expensive regular expression.

item.title: CVE-2019-16565|2024-08-05T01:17:41.026Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20concert%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Team Concert Plugin 1.3.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003083|2024-08-05T03:07:18.210Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gearman%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Gearman Plugin in the GearmanPluginConfig#doTestConnection form validation method allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003072|2024-08-05T03:07:17.947Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20wildfly%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins WildFly Deployer Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003006|2024-08-05T03:00:19.433Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Groovy Plugin 2.0 and earlier in src/main/java/hudson/plugins/groovy/StringScriptSource.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to provide a Groovy script to an HTTP endpoint that can result in arbitrary code execution on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2017-2649|2024-08-05T14:02:07.178Z -- jenkins%20project -- active%20directory%20jenkins%20plugin
item.description: It was found that the Active Directory Plugin for Jenkins up to and including version 2.2 did not verify certificates of the Active Directory server, thereby enabling Man-in-the-Middle attacks.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003045|2024-08-05T03:07:16.801Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ecs%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A vulnerability in Jenkins ECS Publisher Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Extended Read permission, or local file system access to the Jenkins home directory to obtain the API token configured in this plugin's configuration.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003078|2024-08-05T03:07:17.909Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vmware%20lab%20manager%20slaves%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins VMware Lab Manager Slaves Plugin in the LabManager.DescriptorImpl#doTestConnection form validation method allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-16566|2024-08-05T01:17:41.065Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20concert%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Team Concert Plugin 1.3.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003005|2024-08-05T03:00:19.239Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.50 and earlier in src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/scriptsecurity/sandbox/groovy/SecureGroovyScript.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to provide a Groovy script to an HTTP endpoint that can result in arbitrary code execution on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003030|2024-08-05T03:00:19.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.63 and earlier in pom.xml, src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/workflow/cps/CpsGroovyShell.java that allows attackers able to control pipeline scripts to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003076|2024-08-05T03:07:17.920Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20audit%20to%20database%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Audit to Database Plugin in the DbAuditPublisherDescriptorImpl#doTestJdbcConnection form validation method allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003084|2024-08-05T03:07:18.090Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zephyr%20enterprise%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Zephyr Enterprise Test Management Plugin in the ZeeDescriptor#doTestConnection form validation method allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003061|2024-08-05T03:07:17.907Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jenkins-cloudformation-plugin%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins jenkins-cloudformation-plugin Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003056|2024-08-05T03:07:17.883Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20websphere%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins WebSphere Deployer Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16556|2024-08-05T01:17:41.007Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rundeck%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Rundeck Plugin 3.6.5 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file and in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003031|2024-08-05T03:00:19.269Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.13 and earlier in pom.xml, src/main/java/hudson/matrix/FilterScript.java that allows attackers with Job/Configure permission to execute arbitrary code on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003067|2024-08-05T03:07:17.950Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20trac%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Trac Publisher Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003037|2024-08-05T03:07:17.916Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20vm%20agents%20plugin
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability exists in Jenkins Azure VM Agents Plugin 0.8.0 and earlier in src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/vmagent/AzureVMCloud.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003069|2024-08-05T03:07:17.834Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aqua%20security%20scanner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Aqua Security Scanner Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16570|2024-08-05T01:17:40.997Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified web server.

item.title: CVE-2019-16555|2024-08-05T01:17:41.026Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A user-supplied regular expression in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 1.24.1 and earlier was processed in a way that wasn't interruptible, allowing attackers to have Jenkins evaluate a regular expression without the ability to interrupt this process.

item.title: CVE-2019-16545|2024-08-05T01:17:40.302Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20qmetry%20for%20jira%20-%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins QMetry for JIRA - Test Management Plugin transmits credentials in its configuration in plain text as part of job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2019-16576|2024-08-05T01:17:41.023Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20kubernetes%20suport%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Alauda Kubernetes Suport Plugin 2.3.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing the Kubernetes service account token or credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16569|2024-08-05T01:17:40.898Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mantis%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Mantis Plugin 0.26 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified web server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003019|2024-08-05T03:00:19.434Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20github%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: An session fixation vulnerability exists in Jenkins GitHub Authentication Plugin 0.29 and earlier in GithubSecurityRealm.java that allows unauthorized attackers to impersonate another user if they can control the pre-authentication session.

item.title: CVE-2019-16551|2024-08-05T01:17:40.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gerrit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Gerrit Trigger Plugin 2.30.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL or SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003023|2024-08-05T03:00:19.271Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20warnings%20next%20generation%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Jenkins Warnings Next Generation Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier in src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/model/DetailsTableModel.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/model/SourceDetail.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/model/SourcePrinter.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/util/Sanitizer.java, src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/warnings/DuplicateCodeScanner.java that allows attackers with the ability to control warnings parser input to have Jenkins render arbitrary HTML.

item.title: CVE-2019-16547|2024-08-05T01:17:40.265Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in various API endpoints in Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.1.1 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain limited information about the plugin configuration and environment.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003052|2024-08-05T03:07:17.683Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20elastic%20beanstalk%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AWS Elastic Beanstalk Publisher Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003058|2024-08-05T03:07:17.962Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ftp%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins FTP publisher Plugin in the FTPPublisher.DescriptorImpl#doLoginCheck method allows attackers to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-16559|2024-08-05T01:17:40.812Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20websphere%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins WebSphere Deployer Plugin 1.6.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to perform connection tests and determine whether files with an attacker-specified path exist on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003036|2024-08-05T03:07:16.789Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20vm%20agents%20plugin
item.description: A data modification vulnerability exists in Jenkins Azure VM Agents Plugin 0.8.0 and earlier in src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/vmagent/AzureVMAgent.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to attach a public IP address to an Azure VM agent.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003096|2024-08-05T03:07:18.235Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20testfairy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins TestFairy Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003055|2024-08-05T03:07:17.822Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ftp%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins FTP publisher Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16549|2024-08-05T01:17:40.903Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.16.1 and earlier does not configure the XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks, allowing man-in-the-middle attackers to have Jenkins parse crafted XML documents.

item.title: CVE-2019-16548|2024-08-05T01:17:40.791Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.1.1 and earlier in ComputeEngineCloud#doProvision could be used to provision new agents.

item.title: CVE-2019-16572|2024-08-05T01:17:41.015Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20weibo%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Weibo Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003088|2024-08-05T03:07:18.056Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fabric%20beta%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Fabric Beta Publisher Plugin stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003024|2024-08-05T03:00:19.284Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.52 and earlier in RejectASTTransformsCustomizer.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to provide a Groovy script to an HTTP endpoint that can result in arbitrary code execution on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2017-2650|2024-08-05T14:02:06.997Z -- jenkins%20project -- pipeline%3A%20classpath%20step%20jenkins%20plugin
item.description: It was found that the use of Pipeline: Classpath Step Jenkins plugin enables a bypass of the Script Security sandbox for users with SCM commit access, as well as users with e.g. Job/Configure permission in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003091|2024-08-05T03:07:18.227Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20soasta%20cloudtest%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SOASTA CloudTest Plugin in the CloudTestServer.DescriptorImpl#doValidate form validation method allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to initiate a connection to an attacker-specified server.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003012|2024-08-05T03:00:19.427Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugins
item.description: A data modification vulnerability exists in Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugins 1.10.1 and earlier in blueocean-core-js/src/js/bundleStartup.js, blueocean-core-js/src/js/fetch.ts, blueocean-core-js/src/js/i18n/i18n.js, blueocean-core-js/src/js/urlconfig.js, blueocean-rest/src/main/java/io/jenkins/blueocean/rest/APICrumbExclusion.java, blueocean-web/src/main/java/io/jenkins/blueocean/BlueOceanUI.java, blueocean-web/src/main/resources/io/jenkins/blueocean/BlueOceanUI/index.jelly that allows attackers to bypass all cross-site request forgery protection in Blue Ocean API.

item.title: CVE-2019-16568|2024-08-05T01:17:40.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sctmexecutor%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SCTMExecutor Plugin 2.2 and earlier transmits previously configured service credentials in plain text as part of the global configuration, as well as individual jobs' configurations.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003001|2024-08-05T03:00:19.299Z -- jenkins%20project -- pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability exists in Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.61 and earlier in src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/workflow/cps/CpsFlowDefinition.java, src/main/java/org/jenkinsci/plugins/workflow/cps/CpsGroovyShellFactory.java that allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to provide a pipeline script to an HTTP endpoint that can result in arbitrary code execution on the Jenkins master JVM.

item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 1.24.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to have Jenkins evaluate a computationally expensive regular expression.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-08-02T02:51:09.888Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-08-02T02:43:00.455Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-08-02T02:42:59.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-08-01T21:11:12.451Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-07-25T19:50:54.373Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-07-25T19:52:01.223Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T20:18:50.446Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T19:00:20.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T17:06:27.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T17:06:27.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-03-06T17:01:52.616Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-03-06T17:01:52.007Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-06-04T17:41:24.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-06-04T18:03:06.484Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-06-04T18:03:09.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-03-06T17:01:59.995Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-06-04T18:03:13.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-03-06T17:01:56.184Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-06-04T18:03:26.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-06-04T18:03:30.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-06-04T18:03:41.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-06-04T18:03:47.410Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-06-04T18:03:53.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.
